title: More Media Malarkey, NO SPORTS FOR AMERICA 8.28.20
itunes:title: More Media Malarkey, NO SPORTS FOR AMERICA 8.28.20
description:
In episode 704, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Chinedu Unaka to discuss the RNC sham, white supremacy in our country and in the Kenosha police department, Tucker Carlson's racism, the NBA and the WNBA strike, Dr. Fauci being under anesthesia when the CDC changed their covid-19 testing guidelines, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Democrats say RNC ignores Trump record on coronavirus pandemic, economy
  2. Kenosha devolved into anarchy because the authorities abandoned the people. Those in charge, from the governor on down, refused to enforce the law. They’ve stood back and watched Kenosha burn. Are we really surprised that looting and arson accelerated to murder?
  3. KENOSHA COUNTY SHERIFF VICIOUS WORDS FOR BLACK SUSPECTS IN 2018
  4. NBA, WNBA Players Stage Playoff Strike Days After Police Shoot Jacob Blake
  5. Fauci Says He Was Under Anesthesia When CDC Changed COVID-19 Testing Guidelines
  6. WATCH: SaiB - Nightflight

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
